p.5: This microbiome start-up is looking for a bioinformatics engineer to drive development of existing and novel tools. Using Python, DNA sequencing and AWS, this bioinformatics engineer will spearhead the tooling development and bioinformatics analysis. Join their team to create a safer, cleaner, and healthier world to live in.

li: Lead microbiome bioinformatics analysis by collaborating with scientists and developing computational solutions
li.1: Collaborating with internal and external stakeholders in driving company mission
li.2: Developing scalable bioinformatics tools to analyze microbiome data
li.3: Developing ETL pipelines for microbiome data

li: Degree in Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or related fields
li.1: Demonstrated industry experience developing scalable tools
li.3: Industry experience in Snowflake, Redshift, Teradata or other data warehousing tools
li.4: Demonstrated experience in analyzing microbiome, DNA sequencing, and NGS data

li.1: Opportunity for rapid growth, drive microbiome development and strategy, and more!

p.16: Please register your interest by sending your CV to Alyssa Liew via the Apply link on this page.
